parameters.toolDescription: Execute a SQL query in Postgres
parameters.query:
SELECT
    f.*,
    c.*
FROM
    facturas f
JOIN
    clientes c ON f.cliente_id = c.id
WHERE
    f.fecha_vencimiento < CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '7 days'
    AND f.estado != 'pagada';
